name: Navigate (Good Enough Games, Radium Polonium, Ania "Xavier", MagDrez)
name_original: Navigate (Good Enough Games, Radium Polonium, Ania "Xavier", MagDrez)
description:
Guide the spirits to heaven or hell by building paths with provided pieces. Remember to keep their paths separated, as if the spirits meet, they will attract each other and never reach their destinations!

Music by Cosmin Mirza (cosminmirza.com)
